story.text: UNITED NATIONS Ban Ki-moon's new spokesperson, Michele Montas, on Tuesday gave a lesson on how to pronounce the new U.N. secretary-general's name.In South Korea, the family name comes first, so it is Mr. Ban, said Montas.Ban Ki-moon is pronounced -- Bahn Gi-moon, with the K uttered as a hard "g".
story.title: how to pronounce new u . n . secretary - general ' s name
